duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect, service, repair, and maintain diesel locomotives while ensuring compliance with safety regulations and guidelines.
Troubleshoot and repair malfunctions in diesel engines, air brake equipment, running gear, or locomotive components as needed.
Fabricate, cut, shape, and perform finish operations using various types of materials to design replacement parts for equipment.
Perform periodic service on locomotives and miscellaneous activities as assigned by manager.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma/GED. Completion of a mechanical vocational or trade school program preferred.
